full_text:
PURPOSE.

	It is the purpose of this article to establish standards and approval procedures for the Transfer of Floor Area Rights in the Central City TFAR Area; to effect maximum coordination between the Community Redevelopment Agency and the City; to provide for the keeping of records of available Floor Area Rights within the Central City TFAR Area; to provide for an accounting of allocations of Public Benefit Payments and TFAR Transfer Payments derived from the Transfer of Floor Area Rights; and to facilitate those Transfers that generate Public Benefits.

1.name: Transfer Of Floor Area Rights – Central City Community Plan And City Center Redevelopment Project Areas
1.label: article

8.catch_line: Approval Of Transfers - Authority And Procedures For Projects Involving Transfers Of 50,000 Square Feet Or Greater.

plain_text:
LOS ANGELES MUNICIPAL CODE

PURPOSE. (§ 14.5.2)

  PURPOSE.	It is the purpose of this article to establish standards and
approval procedures for the Transfer of Floor Area Rights in the Central City
TFAR Area; to effect maximum coordination between the Community Redevelopment
Agency and the City; to provide for the keeping of records of available Floor
Area Rights within the Central City TFAR Area; to provide for an accounting of
allocations of Public Benefit Payments and TFAR Transfer Payments derived from
the Transfer of Floor Area Rights; and to facilitate those Transfers that
generate Public Benefits.
